skillTree.name: Wandering Wizards
skillTree.description: The Blue Scribes are strange beings, for they have no inherent talent to cast magic themselves, and yet are suffused with it, enhancing the Winds with their very beings

skillTree.name: Tzeentch's Quaestors
skillTree.description: Tzeentch created two Daemons, P’tarix and Xirat’p, tasked with learning every spell in existence, and they have spent their lives categorizing and recording every use of magic they have ever encounter

skillTree.name: Lost Fragments of Knowledge
skillTree.description: P’tarix scrawls frantically with a quill crafted from a Lord of Change’s pinfeather. Xirat’p reads the written words to check for mistakes; in so doing unleashing the knowledge bound within.

skillTree.name: Battlefield Observers
skillTree.description: The Blue Scribes’ mission often draws them to battlefields, where the most destructive and powerful magics are used. If threatened, Xirat’p starts reading at random from the accumulated scrolls, trusting to the hand of fate, his master, to protect him from the whims of the battlefield

skillTree.name: Arch-Manipulator
skillTree.description: As they are a most adept and dedicated magic-user, where this one treads, the Winds always blow high and hard.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +15%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +15%
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Spell Syphon
skillTree.description: Magic flows without and within the Blue Scribes, drawn to pool about their forms and their books, curious and questing

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.description: Effect increases proportional to the number of friendly units in range
Summons a unit of Blue Horrors

skillTree.name: Invulnerable Through Change
skillTree.description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

skillTree.name: Hates Nurgle
skillTree.description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Spirit Leech
skillTree.description: The Wizard extends an ebon hand towards the chosen foe, leeching its spirit through tainted sorcery.

skillTree.name: Aspect of the Dread Knight
skillTree.description: An invisible aura of horror surrounds the Wizard’s allies. Only the bravest foes now stand before them.

skillTree.name: Soulblight
skillTree.description: Harnessing the sickly power of Shyish, the Wizard weakens the foe's will to survive the battle.

skillTree.name: Doom & Darkness
skillTree.description: Spirits of the departed assail the Wizard’s foes, sapping their resolve and causing dread among their numbers.

skillTree.name: The Fate of Bjuna
skillTree.description: Following the fate of the unsmiling warrior, Bjuna, the targets of the caster’s ire will laugh themselves to death.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: The Purple Sun of Xereus
skillTree.description: A colossal orb of purple-edged darkness materialises - those who do not escape its crystalline touch are doomed for eternity!

skillTree.name: Fireball
skillTree.description: The Wizard conjures a boiling ball of magical flame and hurls it at a nearby foe.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Cascading Fire Cloak
skillTree.description: A blazing aura surrounds the Pyromancer's chosen ally, shielding them with protective flame and augmenting their abilities.

skillTree.name: Flaming Sword of Rhuin
skillTree.description: The Wizard ensorcels allied weapons, making them burn with a savage fire. The targets of the spell are augmented with superior flaming blades.

skillTree.name: The Burning Head
skillTree.description: A cackling, flaming visage appears before the Wizard. With a gleeful screech, it swirls around the battlefield, immolating anything in its way.

skillTree.name: Piercing Bolts of Burning
skillTree.description: Focusing all his mystical might, the Pyromancer strikes the foe with a flurry of incandescent missiles.

skillTree.name: Flame Storm
skillTree.description: Conjured by a Bright Wizard or Chaos Sorcerer, a column of churning fire erupts from the battlefield, causing much destruction!

skillTree.name: Harmonic Convergence
skillTree.description: Divining auspicious signs, the caster guides the minds of targets, augmenting them with the foresight needed for victory.

skillTree.name: Wind Blast
skillTree.description: The Astromancer seizes the winds of the battlefield, directing them against the foe to batter the targets with unhallowed gales.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Midnight Wind
skillTree.description: The Wizard issues a three word curse, hexing the target unit and blighting their ability to attack and defend.

skillTree.name: Urannon's Thunderbolt
skillTree.description: The caster calls down a mighty ball of lightning and hurls it - should the foe be struck they will surely be shattered!

skillTree.name: Comet of Casandora
skillTree.description: Reaching to the highest heavens, the Wizard draws a wandering meteorite down upon the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Chain Lightning
skillTree.description: Lightning arcs across the battlefield, leaping from foe-to-foe with crackling fury until there are none left within the storm.

skillTree.name: Shem's Burning Gaze
skillTree.description: Bolts of cleansing energy fly from the Wizard’s hands, searing evil wherever they strike.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Pha's Protection
skillTree.description: The Wizard calls upon the beneficent Guardian of Light to protect his allies from harm.

skillTree.name: Light of Battle
skillTree.description: Reaching into the Wind of Hysh, the Wizard draws forth ennobling energies to steady faint hearts - augmenting allies with courage.

skillTree.name: Net of Amyntok
skillTree.description: The Wizard casts an arcane net, created to hold the Great Deceiver himself. Any caught in its strands will struggle to act.

skillTree.name: Banishment
skillTree.description: Creatures of the dark beware, for the Mage casts a ball of pure light to banish enemies of white wizardry.

skillTree.name: Birona's Timewarp
skillTree.description: The Wizard infuses his allies with Light Magic, freeing them from the passage of time and speeding up their actions.

skillTree.name: Searing Doom
skillTree.description: A spray of sizzling silver slivers rain from the sky to impale the caster's enemy.

skillTree.name: Plague of Rust
skillTree.description: The enemy target's armour begins to rust, disappearing in clouds of tiny flakes and weakening his defensive abilities.

skillTree.name: Glittering Robe
skillTree.description: The Alchemist conjures a gaudy cloak of shimmering scale to improve his allies’ defensive stance.

skillTree.name: Gehenna's Golden Hounds
skillTree.description: Blowing on a glimmering golden whistle, the Wizard summons the spirit of Gehenna’s metal hounds to hunt down his prey.

skillTree.name: Transmutation of Lead
skillTree.description: The enemies’ weapons become heavy, cumbersome, and almost impossible to wield in battle.

skillTree.name: Final Transmutation
skillTree.description: The Wizard unleashes a hail of magical energy, transmuting his foes into Unliving golden statues.

skillTree.name: Awakening of the Wood
skillTree.description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.name: Flesh to Stone
skillTree.description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

skillTree.name: Regrowth
skillTree.description: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

ui_effects.description: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

skillTree.name: The Dwellers Below
skillTree.description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys the foe from within, corroding their minds with doubt and crisis.

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the spellcaster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast-spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: At the spellcaster's command, nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they first appear.

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon was able to shift his shape to that of any monster, even a Manticore. One day he found he could not change back...

ui_effects.description: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Requisition
skillTree.description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Triangulation
skillTree.description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

skillTree.name: Defensive Coordinator
skillTree.description: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Sapper
skillTree.description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ballistics Instructor
skillTree.description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Azure Arcanologists
backgroundSkills.description: The Blue Scribes ride their Disc of Tzeentch through realms eternal and mortal, squabbling as they seek lost fragments of their god to bind them with parchment and ink.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
